Home You are here : Survey Beat » Fashion Retail Surveys »www.Survey4on.com–Old Navy Customer Experience Survey www.Survey4on.com–Old Navy Customer Experience Survey Posted By admin On Monday, February 20, 2012 05:25 AM. Under Fashion Retail Surveys The Old Navy Customer Experience Survey, found at www.Survey4on.com, is an online survey designed by Old Navy that gives customers a chance to leave feedback on services and products. The company uses this information to work harder to meet consumer needs. This is an online survey, which means you can take it whenever you want.
By participating in this survey, you give valuable, important feedback to the company. They then use your information to improve customer service as well as products. As a reward for participating, you will receive a code word to get 15 percent off your next purchase from Old Navy. You can leave feedback without receiving the coupon by simply closing the browser.
You will not have to give any personal information in order to fill out this survey or to recent the discount.
About Old Navy Company
Old Navy is a clothing brand. Their store sells their brand exclusively, as well as other specialty brands affiliated with Old Navy. This is an upscale store, but has affordable prices. They were founded in 1994 and have many stores across the US.
They offer clothing for women, men, and children. They also have shoes and accessories.
How to Participate in the Old Navy Customer Experience Survey ?
You Will Need:
Have a computer with Internet access. Be able to read English, Spanish, or French. Have a recent receipt from an Old Navy store.
Steps To Do Survey:
Go to www.Survey4on.com . Select the language you prefer to take the survey in. Click Begin Survey. Answer the demographic questions asked, such as age and gender. You will be asked to enter the store number. There is a diagram above the text box so you know where to find this information. You will be asked questions based on your most recent experiences. Please answer these questions thoroughly and honestly. You have to answer all questions on the page before moving on. At the end of the survey, you will receive a special code that entitles you to a 15 percent discount on your next purchase. Please write this code down and present next time you shop at Old Navy.
